name: Italian Chickpea Bread
author: sueb
summary: A bread like polenta, but without the corn! This is gluten-free bread with herb flavors based on my take of Liguria, Italy recipes.
directions: Whisk chickpea flour and water together in a bowl until smooth; let sit at room temperature, 2 to 6 hours
Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Spray the inside of an 8-inch metal pie pan
Skim foam from the top of chickpea-water mixture
Add oil, Italian seasoning, and rosemary and stir until combined
Pour mixture into the prepared pan; sprinkle black pepper and salt over the top
Bake in the preheated oven until edges begin to brown, about 15 minutes
Remove bread from pan and cut into wedges
